Uses of AuthenticationProvider in no.tornado.brap.auth
 

Classes in no.tornado.brap.auth that implement AuthenticationProvider
 class AuthenticationNotRequiredAuthenticator
          AuthenticationProvider for not requiring authentication.
 class DatabaseUsernamePasswordAuthenticator
          Authenticator that uses a JDBC datasource to perform the authentication.
 class SingleUsernamePasswordAuthenticator
          Simple AuthenticationProvider that can be pre-configured to authenticate incoming method invocations with a single username/password combination.
